otherNames: アビリティ・コピー, 我能复制天赋, Wo Neng Fu Zhi Tian Fu, I Copy Talents, Ability Copy, I Can Copy Talents, Talent Copycat
synopsis: The young man Ye Tian obtains the ability to copy the talents of others, and now fights against the heavens to change his fate. He struggles to survive and protect his sister from the apocalypse of the alien beast invasion. In order to become stronger, he begins to explore the unknown world, and gradually reveals the secret behind the invasion of the alien dimensions…
